programme.title: A Sporting Chance
programme.desc: Documentary following an initiative to transform the lives of a group of young adults from Limerick through the power of sport, hoping that coaching them on the field will encourage them back into education. Over 12 weeks the group take on a sports journalism programme by day and in the evenings they are coached by former Munster rugby stars in preparation for a prestigious international tag rugby competition in London.(n)

programme.title: A Sporting Chance
programme.desc: Liam Toland and Rosie Foley face an uphill struggle as they try to encourage their charges to commit to their training programme. In an attempt to boost morale, Munster Rugby invites the participants to an evening game, before Liam and Rosie ask them to write about their experience, with the two best essays winning their writers VIP tickets to watch Brian O'Driscoll play in his last home game for Ireland before retirement. Finally, the trainers organise a challenge game for their group, but the training programme hits a major setback when fights break out after the team is badly beaten.(n)

programme.title: A Sporting Chance
programme.desc: Only a few weeks remain before the team must head to London, but spirits are low. Liam Toland and Rosie Foley decide a spot of team-building is in order, and take their charges to the race track for some high-speed go-karting. The group also organises an event for a suicide-prevention charity operating in Limerick, and hopes remain that, if their efforts prove successful, the players' confidence will be boosted ahead of the tag rugby tournament.(n)

programme.title: Salernitana - Lanciano 08/06
programme.desc: Cod. 494893. Serie B. Play Out di ritorno. Collegamento ore 20:00 con Prepartita. Adesso è tutto più facile per la Salernitana: dopo il 4-1 in trasferta dell'andata, la squadra di Menichini torna all'Arechi nel secondo play-out salvezza per ospitare la Virtus Lanciano. Ultima fatica di una stagione interminabile: i campani possono anche perdere con 3 gol di scarto e restare ugualmente in B. Telecronaca Massimo Tecca e Lorenzo Minotti(n)
